decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The proposed development would appear cramped and incongruous and cause detriment to the visual and spatial relationship between the building and adjacent dwellings, contrary to policies ENV-B.1.1 and H.6.4 of the London Borough of Hounslow Unitary Development Plan, adopted 12 December 2003.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development by virtue of its size and position adjoining the residential flats at 137 Windmill Road would be visually obtrusive and dominant, and serve to enclose the access to the flats to the detriment of the level of amenity of their occupiers, contrary to policies ENV-B.1.1 and H.6.4 of the London Borough of Hounslow Unitary Development Plan, adopted 12 December 2003.
description: Erection of two storey extension to NW elevation to create a garage with storage above and erection of first floor extension to NE elevation to create a bedroom incorporating vehicle access below to existing dwellinghouse.
